import React, { useState } from "react" import { Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap" import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" function Create() { const [name, setname] = useState("") const [age, setage] = useState("") const [salary, setsalary] = useState("") let history = useNavigate() //Function for making a new post request const handelSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (name === "" || age === "" || salary === "") { alert("invalid input") return } const newUser = {user: { Name: name, Age: age, Salary: salary }} fetch("http://localhost:5000/api", { method: 'POST', headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(newUser) }).then(() => window.location.reload()) history("/") } return (
setname(e.target.value) } type="text" placeholder="Enter Name" required /> setage(e.target.value) } type="number" placeholder="Age" required /> setsalary(e.target.value) } type="number" placeholder="Salary" required />
) } export default Create
